name: TV Shopping
description:
OH CRAP! Your child broke your tv! Luckily, you're a super-smart, rich cool person who can buy any tv you want, if it fits your exact specific conditions. 

After you find the perfect tv, the choice is yours. Do you go home and plug the tv in right away or do you stick around to help the weird people with their problems??

Again, this was a school project. I tried to make it a lot bigger than my last project so I hope it pays off. I also hope the audio actually works.
